title: (Fri Early Bird) Bobby Bones Show Big Updates + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Did This Mom Go Too Far with Her Punishment?
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Bobby Bones Show Big Updates + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Did This Mom Go Too Far with Her Punishment?
description:
We all update you on stories that we have shared from Amy’s tick test results, Eddie’s Uber refund and Raymundo trying to get people to vote for him for the trip to Vegas. We face off in a round of Easy Trivia. And in the mailbag, a mom wants to know if her grounding her son for the summer was too harsh after he got caught in a big fat lie. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
